timeline.bodyText: This comment does not seem to be necessary because it does not add much information. You might want to remove this (and for the other tests below as well).
timeline.author: joanneong

timeline.bodyText:
Besides just checking whether the exception is thrown, is it possible for you to check the error message? This is because even with ActionFactory.java, there can be ActionMappingException thrown for different reasons.
(Same for the test below)
timeline.author: joanneong

timeline.bodyText: There is a slight grammatical error here for "Method does not on action exist".
